title: Remote Sensing Image Interpretation: Performance-Based Practical Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic Geographic Information Systems (GIS) and remote sensing concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based LMS access environment, limited real-time interaction, and asynchronous tools for project collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can analyze actual satellite imagery to produce a land cover classification report
Learners can conduct an environmental change detection project utilizing remote sensing data
Learners can visualize spatial information using tools such as QGIS Mobile on mobile devices

resources: Open-source remote sensing software (e.g., ENVI, QGIS)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
